docs.text: Crypt of the Everflame Solo RPG Playthrough ¶ The story so far... Our characters are 18 year old youths going on the Quest of the Everflame as their right of passage. They are: Fighter Bruna Holden Cleric Rodrick Evans Wizard Celestia Windborne Rogue Stek Wiggleton Sessions: Day 01 - Rite of Passage - Find and return the Everflame Day 02 - At the Crypt Level 1 of the crypt ![[Drawing 2022-08-23 13.51.22.excalidraw]]
